title: Ut Danum - New Testament (Book)
description: Ot Danum is a Barito language of the central Borneo, Indonesia, spoken by the Ot Danum people. Dialects include Cihie and Dohoi.

language.name: Ot Danum
language.area: Upper reaches of south Borneo River, large area south of Schwaner Range. Ulu Aiâ€™ on Mandai River with 7 villages.
